Inc-Query | Operations | Full-time | Chicago or REMOTE (US time zones only) | https://inc-query.com

Bootstrapped, profitable, very rapidly growing B2B tech company. We program surveys insanely fast for private equity and management consulting clients. I (the founder) am looking for someone to help support the crazy growth and do some of the "things that don't scale." (Mostly helping clients with their surveys and dealing with partners)

Ideal background is a mix of business knowledge and programming experience, though the role is flexible if you're more of one or the other. This is a great opportunity to learn more about PE and consulting if you're coming from a tech background or learn more about tech if you're coming from a business background.

hn@inc-query.com
